attributes.action: 6 months compulsive national service for school leavers
attributes.additional_details:
To legislate for all school leavers to do six months national service. The time should be spend supporting health and social care, local communities/councils and environmental charities (e.g. the woodland trust, the RSPB or national parks).

A service like that would encourage and increase a sense of responsibility, broaden horizons/minds and be educationalas well as being of great practical value.
